key.name: debug
key.description: If true the extension will print verbosely to the log. See 'journalctl /usr/bin/gnome-shell -f -o cat' for output.

key.name: device-indicators
key.description: If true, each device will be given an indicator in the Status Area. If false, each device will be given a submenu in the User Menu.

key.name: show-offline
key.description: If true, cached devices will be shown in the interface even when they are offline.

key.name: show-unpaired
key.description: If true, devices will be shown in the interface even if they have not been paired.

key.name: start-mconnect
key.description: If true, MConnect will be automatically started and restarted if it stops. If false the extension will wait for MConnect to be started.
